body:
This PR adds preliminary `py-numpy` stand-alone test.

Unfortunately, the tests depend on the availability of the `pytest` `test` dependency during stand-alone testing, which *may* be available if you're defaulting to an external python but won't if trying to use a Spack-installed python.

TODO:

- [x] Test with Python 3.8 that has `pytest`
- [x] Test with Python 3.9 that has `pytest`
title: tests/py-numpy: Preliminary stand-alone tests
